entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Marshaller type to support SafeHandle in source-generated marshalling without hard-coding in the generator #74035
    8.0.0
  • ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback(checkRevocation: True) failed on macOS 12 with RevocationStatusUnknown #74034
  • [API Proposal]: Custom [Try]GetValue<T> methods on JsonElement for efficient projection of string values to dotnet types #74028
  • Proposal: Update minimum CMake version required to build the dotnet/runtime repo to 3.18.1 #74027
    8.0.0
  • [Regression] System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink Equals broken in net7 preview #74026
    7.0.0
  • Prevent behavioral change in built-in operators for IntPtr and UIntPtr #74022
    7.0.0
  • Unnecessary shr emitted for repeated multiplication #74020
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 188 Regressions from GC changes #74014
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x86: 16 Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml #74013
  • System.Text.Json -> Deserialize Null to Integer Property #74008
  • Access Violation in CastHelpers.ChkCastClassSpecial #74005
    Future
  • Hang for x64 runtime on arm64 Windows virtual machine #74003
    7.0.0
  • UInt128 implicit casting #74001
  • [NativeAot] Devirtualization opportunity around field loads #74000
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize call doesn't return and continues to run for large lists. #73992

Closed

  • Support constructor parameters in JsonConverter attribute #73984
  • CI build failed: "Agent was purged, cancelling the pipeline" #73339
  • Info in host/testing.md is outdated for local testing #73993
    8.0.0
  • DataContract and derived types missing Equals implementation #67371
  • Mono WASM debugger displays private members of base class alongside other properties #43184
    8.0.0
  • Can't get assembly probing to work; not sure why. #73710
  • .NET 6 SDK not being recognized on popOS 22.04 #73764
  • src/libraries/Native changes don't trigger GCC leg #58779
    7.0.0
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe #3188
    7.0.0
  • Nanosecond time #27191
    Future
  • Optimize generated code for Fixed statement #4872
  • String.StartsWith doesn't work if the string contains "AA" when using Norwegian/Danish cultureinfo in .NET 6 #73999
  • ./src/tests/build.sh: No such file or directory #72921
  • Mono runtime tests build occasionally times out #40933
    Future
  • Cross-Architecture publish user experience should be better #71395
    7.0.0
  • runtimeconfig.template support #72310
    8.0.0
  • [ NativeAOT ] Using PublishSingleFile option leads to "Invalid input specification" exception #72559
    8.0.0
  • AccessViolationException should not be catchable #73794
    7.0.0
  • ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed. #73755
    Future
  • NativeAOT ignores dependency's changes #64163
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.Volatile_and_durable_enlistments #73874
    7.0.0
  • Intermediate Certs not being sent from client to server on MAC #66537
    Future
  • Application Crash #71708
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.ComponentModel #73724
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move X.509 certificate tests under S.S.Cryptography #74033
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Add missing .npmrc in sample #74031
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #74029
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix nullable annotations on generic math interfaces #74025
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #74024
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #74023
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Disable the ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success test for NativeAOT #74019
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Net7 workload changes #74018
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • perf pipeline: Switch to node 14.x #74017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove project dependency in System.Configuration.Tests.csproj #74016
    area-System.Configuration, test-bug
  • Add `--reference-file` to ilverify #74012
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74002
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove reflection from AppHostUpdateTests #73988
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Bump main branding to 8.0 #73985
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Make FileInfo/DirectoryInfo.Name lazy #73983
    area-System.IO
  • Change to GetLastPInvokeError where possible #73980
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Update S.R.Metadata in HostModel #74009
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Disable ILASM roundtrip for mainv2 test #73956
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Reset OOB package authoring for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #74032
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Hide members from classes that don't have debug information #73982
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Product dependencies in Versions.props must be on the latest patch version for libraries dependencies #73871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Use buffer.Length as the source of truth for ReadDirectoryChanges' nBufferLength #73970
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix permissions value in S.D.Process tests #74011
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #73972
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Make PublishAot incremental #73989
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve failure mode when PublishSingleFile and PublishAot are specified together #73995
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Warn if runtimeconfig.template.json is used with PublishAot #73996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Publish ILC as a trimmed+R2R+singlefile executable #73987
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Private.DataContractSerialization #73977
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix formatting of arm/arm64 addresses #73967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix handling of corrupted state exceptions on Windows #73889
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix another PublishAot incrementality issue #73994
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry distributed transaction tests on MSDTC startup failure #73941
    area-System.Transactions
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x

Updated

  • Revert "Clean up AOT publish process" #74036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reenable HugeExpr Test on macOS ARM64 #73976
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Bring back PreInitializedAttribute handling to NativeAOT #73966
    NO-MERGE, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Skip assertion list look ups where unnecessary #73142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    area-System.Memory
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Gradual decommit in wks #73620
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 PGO/IBC to Windows and Linux builds #73973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add JSON Int128 and UInt128 support #73892
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix R2RDump in the presence of composite images #73979
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [WASM] Cross-OS native compilation is not supported #1961

Closed

  • "Unresolved external symbol" when trying to P/Invoke exported function from separate library #1959
  • SIGSEGV in System.Runtime tests on Alpine #1093

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using PrivateAssets="all" on a package reference seems remove the assemblies from the final output #27211
  • Multiple -s/--source flags on "dotnet build" and "dotnet restore" not working #27202
  • Allow share template name for different languages #27200
  • [ApiCompat] Add integration tests for the ValidateAssemblies task #27196
  • .Net 7 preview 7 is broken on alpine arm64 #27190

Closed

  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Reopened from #26061 #27073
  • THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT needed for SDK repo? #24542
    Discussion
  • PackageValidation task cannot find nuget package due to version normalization #18660
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27218
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Quote file paths for the Blazor and Razor task tools #27213
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port predownload changes into .3xx #27209
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port predownload changes into 6.0.1xx #27208
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Support multiple Windows SDK versions for different TFMs #27207
  • Support multiple unique assembly ids in packages and tasks #27203
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines for new files #27201
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE
  • Support directories and globs as lefts and rights #27197
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Loc fix in ApiCompat #27194
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update ubuntu version #27193
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.3xx] Support different Windows SDK package versions for different target frameworks #27206
  • .NET 6 Fix .NET MAUI Blazor Scoped CSS Hot Reload #27108
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore, 6.0.4xx
  • Support different Windows SDK package versions for different target frameworks #27199
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.401
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #27195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean-up rules (styling) and make CompatDifference a readonly struct #27155
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Don't calculate package path manually #27181
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Migrated to newest version of `FluentAssertions` #27132
  • Handle InvalidDataException when trying to write to cache and then read #27171
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle error when status runtime information cannot find version in productCollection. #26676
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [semi-auto-props]: Revise spec regarding `set;` #6089

Updated

  • Proposal: Struct Lambdas #1060
  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove #6089 from schedule #6381

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullReferenceException assigning ref field in object initializer #63434
    17.4
  • EditorConfig UI is missing dotnet_sort_system_directives_first #63430
  • Incorrectly reporting CA1822: Member can be marked static #63429
  • UTF8 multiline raw string literals don't show left column guide in the IDE #63428
  • `default(T) is not null` doesn't teach compiler about `default(T)` #63425
    17.4
  • GTD fails for subsequent symbol navigation with SourceLink #63424
  • Low level struct improvements treat [UnscopedRef] differently in source code and in metadata, allowing returning pointers to current method's stack memory #63423
  • Deleting a later node does not trigger an update？ #63422
  • IDE0049 should be updated to suggest converting IntPtr to nint and UIntPtr to nuint. #63421
  • Using Source Generator occurs a weird building error #63418

Closed

  • The entire expression is faded when LSP pull diagnostics are on #63147
    17.4
  • Building Corelib in runtime triggers several asserts #63348
    17.4
  • New IOperation: IAttributeOperation #53618
    Compiler.Next
  • No warning when base required member is not initialized in constructor with "SetsRequiredMembers" attribute #61718
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32816.141 #63433
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in MethodSymbol.get_ThisParameter() #63384
    17.4
  • Report escape error for method invocation with ref argument with narrower lifetime than ref struct argument #62327
    17.4
  • The compiler broke recently #63395
    17.4
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref-returning from a struct #62901
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32815.244 #63417

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure all ref local and field value access are dereferenced #63432
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Regression test for ref struct in iterator #63415
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • [LSP] Fix fading diagnostics #63420
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Share a DiagnosticAnalyzerInfoCache between DiagnosticAnalyzerService and DiagnosticAnalyzerServiceQuickInfoProvider #63392
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix compilation of exe RefFieldTests #63431
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove portion of incremental-analyzer-infrastructure that has no usage. #63426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation, Next
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Remove bogus assert #63419
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove obsoleted unit-testing EA type that is no longer in use. #63427
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash in ref escape around missing this param #63414
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add 'cancel current batch' capabilities to async-batching-work-queus. #63412
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move DesignerAttribute scanning off of SolutionCrawler #63190
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #63197
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Pass SolutionServices in more places #63398
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use non-recursive DFS when visit binary expression #63374
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next

Updated

  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • ConvertToRecord: Property and Method analysis #63320
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add return types to SymbolKey creation and resolution #63304
    Area-IDE
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove default Response (200) on methods POST, PUT and DELETE #43330
  • Code cleanup: Removing a superfluous switch block in Kestrel/Core #43328
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.RoleManager registered NET 6 #43327
  • Assembly loading failed #43326
  • Blazor - Still cannot specify generic type constraints for Components #43325
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #43322
  • CorsPolicyBuilder does not correctly combine policy with DefaultIsOriginAllowed #43319
  • Customise blazor-error-ui at runtime #43318
  • Blazor Wasm MSAL authentication stuck on loggin in when msal.js returns "Operation Completed" #43317
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22413.1] Setting the header Content-Length is not allowed on responses with status code 204 Error in ASP.NET Core apps #43316
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #43314
  • JwtBearerEvents might be null, despite being marked as not null #43313

Closed

  • Improve code using pattern matching #43277
    8.0-alpha1
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • HTTP/2: Consider increasing default window sizes #41825
    7.0-rc1
  • Unable to connect to the SPA development server at 'https://localhost:44490'. / Visual Studio 2022 - ASP.NET Core Angular #43243
  • Perf improvement: https #43305
  • [API] Add client result support to Java client #41777
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SocketTransportOptions doc comment reference #43332
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #43329
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43324
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix resolving method declaration in separate file #43323
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't throw TaskCanceledException in RateLimitingMiddleware #43320
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Improve code using pattern matching #43285
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43321
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #43307
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43302
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43312
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #43315
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43311
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Follow-ups to 'Fix MVC form data binding localization' (#43182) #43309
    area-mvc, 8.0-alpha1
  • Update Major Version/TFM doc #43308
    8.0-alpha1
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Exclusively use Azure (public) feeds #43303
    area-infrastructure
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    blocked, area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    area-web-frameworks
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
  • Perf-up the AuthZ! #43268
    community-contribution
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DataGrid #9479
  • Missing LifeCycle events for SceneDelegate on iOS and MacCatalyst #9476
    .NET 7
  • OnAppearing gets called numerous times before page appears on Windows version of app #9473
  • XamlParseException when using an Int32 value for a RadioButton #9471
  • DisplayAlert does not works in Windows, does in Android #9469
    Backlog
  • Base page events no longer works #9468
    Backlog
  • Error while trying to run sample app for first time #9467
  • [Windows 11 Insider] Image appears distorted. #9464
    Backlog
  • Cannot compile for build 17763 (Windows 10 version 1809) #9463
  • How to customize the automation peer for W2DGraphicsView #9460
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .NET MAUI: Switching the App's MainPage multiple times leads to exception #9459
    Backlog
  • Grid View Row is not working as expected #9458
    Backlog
  • Carousel View doesn't update its hierachy tree on Windows with Loop set to False #9457
    Backlog
  • File not found. JAVAC? #9454
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode #9453
    Backlog
  • Image size limit to select a picture from Library in MAUI.Essentials #9452
    Backlog
  • GraphicsView Select Path. #9451
  • ScrollView not working, not reacting to when keyboard is opened #9450
  • MAUI Blazor for Windows - Remote Debugging: "ERR_ADDRESS_INVALID" #9449
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Allow Native MAUI Controls to be placed and used from .razor pages in Blazor Hybrid App #9378
  • MauiIcon or MauiSplashScreen generated wrong color. #9443
  • Unable to install MAUI dev env workload #9202
  • Fail to load platform specific dll at runtime. #9427

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    community ✨
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.3 to 1.1.4 #9435
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, 7.0-rc1
  • Improve design type converters #9447

Updated

  • Convert more Android controls to AppCompat counterparts #9342
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr5
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • [.NET 6] [Blazor] Account for Maui multi-rid builds (#9348) #9393

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bind member on result of single entity result subquery #28752
  • Prune subquery projections in ExecuteUpdate SQL #28751
  • Performance of queries: raw SQL vs EF #28746
  • ExecuteDelete with optional reference navigation in filter fails with SQLite #28745
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Received Error The entity type '***' requires a primary key to be defined. If you intended to use a keyless entity type, call 'HasNoKey' in 'OnModelCreating' On Inside Entity Coulmn #28744
  • Json: consider incorporating key property map when computing hash for JsonQueryExpression #28740
    Backlog

Closed

  • Usage of typeMappingSource in SqlServerPropertyExtensions.GetValueGenerationStrategy #26674
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Validate that an entity type with sproc mapping is mapped to a table #28748
    7.0.0
  • Exception when owned entity contains properties of a type with a value converter #28747

  • SQL Server: Possible off-by one in batch splitting logic #13639
  • Scaffold-DbContext generate directories based on schema #28550
  • Improve experience for data binding and graphical interfaces #26799
    7.0.0-rc1
  • bug or question for cosmos db provider about replacing an object that throw an error on a property id that doesnt exist #28730
  • Getting Obsolete warnings from scaffolding #28743
  • How to avoid COMMIT and SAVE TRANSACTION queries? #28724
  • Cannot configure different Identity column facets for different tables in TPC mapping #28195
    7.0.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 7.0-rc1 to 7.0 #28757
  • ExecuteDelete: Generate correct Contains method when query has unsupp… #28755
  • Uniquify FK and Key constraint names across tables #28753
    providers-beware
  • Add a custom convention which adds a blank trigger to all tables #28749
    tell-mode

Merged

  • ExecuteUpdate: Convert to join for query with unsupported operations #28741
    auto-merge
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #28691
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Validate that an entity type with sproc mapping is mapped to a table #28750
    tell-mode
  • Generate identity SQL for different seeds in TPC #28742
  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #28732
    blocked

Updated

  • Add support for CSharpHelper for Dictionary literals #28330
    auto-merge
  • Allow value converters to change nullability of columns #28663
